meanings.definition: xeriscapes: landscapes or gardens designed to require little or no irrigation
meanings.sent1: The xeriscapes in the park have plants that need very little water to grow.
meanings.sent2: Many homeowners are opting for xeriscapes to save on water bills.
meanings.sent3: The xeriscapes in the desert looked like a colorful oasis in the dry land.
meanings.sent4: Her backyard xeriscapes were a refreshing sight in the midst of a scorching summer.
meanings.sent5: The xeriscapes were so vibrant and lush, you wouldn't believe they needed minimal watering.

meanings.definition: xeriscapes: the practice of landscaping with drought-resistant plants
meanings.sent1: Learning about xeriscapes helps gardeners choose the right plants for dry climates.
meanings.sent2: Xeriscapes are becoming more popular as people seek sustainable gardening options.
meanings.sent3: The xeriscapes class taught us how to make our garden thrive even in arid conditions.
meanings.sent4: Her expertise in xeriscapes turned her garden into a haven for desert flora.
meanings.sent5: The beauty of xeriscapes lies in their ability to flourish without constant watering.

meanings.definition: xeriscapes: to create a garden or landscape that conserves water
meanings.sent1: She xeriscapes her yard by planting drought-resistant flowers and using mulch.
meanings.sent2: Many environmentally conscious individuals xeriscape to reduce water usage.
meanings.sent3: He decided to xeriscape his lawn after realizing the benefits of water conservation.
meanings.sent4: The community came together to xeriscape the public park for a greener future.
meanings.sent5: Xeriscaping not only saves water but also adds a unique charm to any outdoor space.
